Author: SHybrid
Text: Totally get it, I had so many fights about it in my family and I also had to cut out some friends because of their unhealthy comments. At least my boyfriend gets it and when my ed kicks in he gently distracts me from food or just say something like "are you ok?". He should write a book about dealing with a bulimic gf. As a matter of fact we should totally publish a guide to deal with a loved one with an ED!
